[id='connecting-to-ftp']
= Connecting to an FTP or SFTP server

In an integration, you can connect to an FTP or SFTP server to download or 
upload files by creating an FTP or SFTP connection. You can then add this 
connection to any number of integrations. The following topics provide details:

* <<creating-ftp-connections>>
* <<adding-ftp-connections>>

include::creating_ftp_connections.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::adding_ftp_connections.adoc[leveloffset=+1]
